name: 葛瑞斐
objective: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  In addition to noting stylistic strategies for revision and improved clarity, we will focus on the preparation and planning needed for a research paper – on the kinds of questions and arguments which could potentially lead to a viable Senior Writing Project.
schedule:
1:	Introduction
2-4: 	Arguments
4-8:  	Problems
9:  	MIDTERM
10-14:  Style (Clarity)
15-17:  Developing Project Topics
18           FINAL
